Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType Text001

trans-unit.source: This e-mail is from Microsoft Dynamics BC. Please do not reply
trans-unit.target: This e-mail is from Microsoft Dynamics BC. Please do not reply
trans-unit.note: Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType Text009

trans-unit.source: We are pleased to inform you of %1 opportunity within the organisation. Kindly click on the link below to see the Job Description and the requirements.
trans-unit.target: We are pleased to inform you of %1 opportunity within the organisation. Kindly click on the link below to see the Job Description and the requirements.
trans-unit.note: Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType Text002

trans-unit.source: You may refer qualified applicants to apply for the role.
trans-unit.target: You may refer qualified applicants to apply for the role.
trans-unit.note: Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType Text003

trans-unit.source: Applicants should send their application as the body of the email indicating the position applied for as email subject and their CV in MS Word or PDF format as an attachment to hr@relianceinfosystems.com copying careers@relianceinfosystems.com
trans-unit.target: Applicants should send their application as the body of the email indicating the position applied for as email subject and their CV in MS Word or PDF format as an attachment to hr@relianceinfosystems.com copying careers@relianceinfosystems.com
trans-unit.note: Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType Text004
Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType Text005

trans-unit.source: Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
trans-unit.target: Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
trans-unit.note: Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType Text006

trans-unit.source: Transport requisition with ID No. %1 raised by %2 for the purpose of (%3) requires your attention. Please find details below:
trans-unit.target: Transport requisition with ID No. %1 raised by %2 for the purpose of (%3) requires your attention. Please find details below:
trans-unit.note: Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType Text007

trans-unit.source: This is a system generated mail.
trans-unit.target: This is a system generated mail.
trans-unit.note: Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType SystemGenerated

trans-unit.source: Please be informed that your transport requisition for the purpose of %1 has been finally approved by %2.
trans-unit.target: Please be informed that your transport requisition for the purpose of %1 has been finally approved by %2.
trans-unit.note: Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType Text008
Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType Text010

trans-unit.source: Cash Advance with No. %1 requires your urgent payment processing. Kindly proceed to disburse the payment to the beneficiary on the approved payment requisition page.
trans-unit.target: Cash Advance with No. %1 requires your urgent payment processing. Kindly proceed to disburse the payment to the beneficiary on the approved payment requisition page.

Page HR Staff Transport Requisition - NamedType Text012
